titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Heinz and Senator Specter in the case of "Wesley Carroll v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, et al."

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/20/1987--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Heinz and Senator Specter in the case of Wesley Carroll v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, et al.
